en: You haven't been getting as many task offers of late, so you have no work for today. You could spend the time applying for freelance contracts and sprucing up your website, or take the day to look after yourself?
You add your most recent work to your resume and portfolio, and get your name out there. The hope that some of it will pay off puts you in a good mood.
You really needed a 'duvet day'. It's a welcome indulgence.
